page.title: 16CROSSGATES_LAST 20 YEARS_2
page.content: The new road links also brought more people,wanting to settle in the area. This show in Crossgates where recently two new private housing schemes have sprung up.One to the west of the village where the new road is being built,and another of which part is still under construction,to the south. Due to the closeness of the new road being built,which will connect Dunfermline with Kircaldy and Glenrothes,the houses in the estate to the west,have decreased in price,and some owners are moving to the southern estate. Also recently,the Lauder Technical College has moved to new buildings in Hallbeath,and between Crossgates and Hallbeath a {Bells Scotch Whiskey } bottling factory has opened.This has paved the way for a new industrial estate in the area.
